general_advisory: According to the District level weather warnings, there is no heavy rainfall expected, but very light rainfall may occur in some places. Farmers are advised to postpone harvesting and spraying operations for some days.

advisory: Make arrangements to maintain sufficient water and drain out excess stagnated rainwater from rice field.
Avoid irrigation and postpone harvesting and spraying operations for some days.
Keep the harvested produce in safe places.
Regular monitoring against different pests and disease should be advised.
Postpone all type of spraying and intercultural operations for some days.
Make provision to drain out excess water from field to avoid lodging of plant.
Irrigation as well as chemical application is recommended in okra.
Farmers should make provision for proper drainage system.
Planting of new plants is recommended.
Chemical application should be done before the occurrence of rainfall.
Animal should be kept at safe places in shed.
Avoid mixing flowing rainwater into the source of drinking water and provide pure and clean drinking water to animals.
Animal should stay away from any electrical instruments during rain.
